title: Vision in mathematics: the unit circle
creator_credit: Australian Broadcasting Commission and Jonathon Dawson
brief_description: Gives an activity to determine the mathematical relationship “sine” and shows how to apply the principle of “sine” in measuring the heights of various objects.
